Yggdrasil: Bring a snack, Jackie, it might be a long ride. As to avoid
detection, I'll generate a sensor shroud. No one but me will be
noticed on our approach, but you'll have to be close and careful. It
only works against sensors and auto-defenses, so you'll have to worry
about optics.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Wheeljack-X::
> 
> "When's lunch?"  It's hard to tell if Jackie's serious or not.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > WindLord:
> > 
> > "Any plan to avoid hur or accidentally kill anyone at the Ark?" 
> > asked Windlord
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > : : Kup : :
> > > 
> > > Kup: Your damn right it's a delicate mission, lad. We cant go in 
> > shooting to kill at first. We need to learn what they have been 
> > doing. Why are they only now messing around the Ark. But after we 
> > get answers..., well, their Predacons and this is war. You know 
> what 
> > to do. Any questions?
> > > 
> > > 
> > > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > Yggdrasil: Indeed it is. What's more, I've recently detected 
> > Predacon
> > > activity there, but I've lost track of them. My circuits are 
> good, 
> > but
> > > I can't multitask that much as to keep close track of the Ark at 
> > all
> > > time. If it were up to me, I'd want no prisoner taken, only 
> smoking
> > > hulks... But, Kup is also in charge. All I can say is hurt them, 
> > but
> > > not as much as to silence them.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > > Windlord:
> > > > 
> > > > "This mission it's... very delicate..."mutered the male

> > > > > : : Kup : :
> > > > > 
> > > > > Kup: Windlord, Convoy, Wheeljack, the five of us will be 
> > elaving on 
> > > > a mission. There has been some Predacon activity at the 
> location 
> > of 
> > > > the Autobot starship Ark. I'm sure you all understand the 
> > dangers to 
> > > > the timeline. We must respond and hope to avoid any temporal 
> > mishaps.
> > > > >
